page.title: 03THE LOCAL SCENE
page.content:
{THE LOCAL SCENE : CHILDREN.
People grumble that they are bored,but there is quite a bit to do locally. It's just that you have to look for it.
In the village there is a large playing field with swings,a climbing frame and a slide.
At school ( in Donington ) there are a number of clubs and activities and we have our own outdoor swimming pool.
There is also a youth club and snooker club but both of these are also in Donington.
It is a rural area and it is up to us to find things to do.
